name: Fortroyale Battleground
storyline: You jump on a large map and start looking for equipment, with which you can survive among hundreds of players, guide for fortnite. Look for armor that will help you to escape in difficult situations when other players attack you. Guide for fortnite. Only one will survive!
summary: A battle royale with RPG elements, in which you need to survive by yourself or a command in a large location, extracting resources and building protective structures.
